required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioequivalence of Two NovoLog速 Formulations in Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
clinical_study.official_title: A Single Center, Randomized, Double-blind, Balanced Two-period Cross-over Trial to Test for Bioequivalence Between a Marketed NovoLog速 Formulation Containing 100 U/mL Versus a New NovoLog速 Formulation Containing 200 U/mL in a Combined Regimen of a Continuous Subcutaneous Infusion and a Meal-time Bolus in Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes

brief_summary.textblock: This trial is conducted in the United States of America (USA). The aim of this trial is to evaluate the clinical performance of two formulations of insulin aspart (NovoLog速) in subjects with type 1 diabetes.

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the insulin aspart bolus concentration-time curve
primary_outcome.time_frame: From 0 and up to 12 hours post bolus dose administration

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) of insulin aspart
primary_outcome.time_frame: From 0 and up to 12 hours post bolus dose administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to maximum concentration (Tmax) of insulin aspart
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From 0-12 hours post bolus dose administration

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC (area under the curve) of insulin aspart
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From -4 to 0 hours after dose administration

intervention.description: An initial priming dose of insulin aspart is administered, then a continuous subcutaneous insulin aspart infusion followed by a bolus of insulin aspart on top of the continuous insulin aspart infusion

An initial priming dose of insulin aspart is administered, then a continuous subcutaneous insulin aspart infusion followed by a bolus of insulin aspart on top of the continuous insulin aspart infusion

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with type 1 diabetes treated with insulin for at least 12 months
- BMI (Body Mass Index) between 18.0-29.0 kg/m^2
- Negative fasting C-peptide (below or equal to 0.6 ng/mL)
- HbA1c (glycosylated haemoglobin A1c) below or equal to 10.0%
- Current treatment with insulin below or equal to 1.2 U/kg/day
- Subject should be in good health based on medical history, physical examination and routine laboratory data
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any known/suspected allergies to trial medication or similar products/devices
- A subject who has proliferative retinopathy or maculopathy, and/or severe neuropathy, in particular autonomic neuropathy, as judged by the Investigator
- Clinically significant active disease of any kind
- Recurrent major hypoglycemia or hypoglycemic unawareness, as judged by the Investigator
- Blood donation (more than 500 mL) within the previous 9 weeks

intervention_browse.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
